General.Name: Tianjin Ruixin Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Tianjin Ruixin Technology Co.,Ltd engages in the research and development, production, and sales of industrial precision aluminum alloy parts and components in China and internationally. It processes aluminum alloy parts. The company's products include pressing, heat transmission heatsink, communication heatsink, standard heatsink, aluminum precision parts, GPS heatsink, electromagnetic shielding shell, high finned heatsink, battery power supply heatsink, medium voltage drive heatsink, moto housing, heatsink samples, pump body, industrial profile, TV station heatsink, filter housing, LED heatsink, inserted fins assembly heatsink, train traction heatsink, and actuator housing. Its products are used in various applications, such as industrial automation and medical equipment, clean energy power generation, automotive lightweight, and new energy vehicles. The company was formerly known as Tianjin Ruixinchang Light Alloy Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Tianjin Ruixin Technology Co.,Ltd in November 2017. Tianjin Ruixin Technology Co.,Ltd was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in Tianjin, China.
General.Address: No. 5, Haitai North Road, Tianjin, China, 300384
